isActive.description: Indicates if the Timecard is active

description.description: Brief description of what you are working on.

startTime.description: ISO8601 of when the meeting started.

endTime.description: ISO8601 of when the meeting ended.

duration.description: Duration of the timecard session in minutes

discordUserId.description: Discord Id of the user that initiated the Timecard.

discordServerId.description: Identifier for the discord guild where Timecard was activated
